(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (ADVP (RB ,))))


root(ROOT-0, Now-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT this) (NNP Teochew) (NN Kitchen))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN recommended)
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Fashionfoodie))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who)))))))
    (, ,)))

rcmod(Fashionfoodie-7, who-8)

  (S
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ our) (NNP Teochew) (NNP Ah) (NNPS Hias))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (ADVP (RB really))
                (VP (VBZ loves)
                  (NP (PRP$ his) (NNP Peh) (NNP Dou) (NNP Her)))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (SBAR
      (WHADVP (WRB when))
      (S
        (NP (PRP he))
        (VP (VBD started)
          (S
            (VP (VBG going)
              (PRT (RP on))
              (PP (IN about)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Braised) (NNP Duck)
                    (CC and)
                    (NNP Tua) (NNP Terng))
                  (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                    (NP (JJ Large) (NNS intestines))
                    (-RRB- -RRB-)))
                (ADVP (RB here)))
              (, ,))))))))

advmod(about-7, here-18)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN place)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB go)
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (DT the) (NN family)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP
                        (VP (VB enjoy)
                          (NP (DT a) (JJ few)
                            (ADJP (RB typically) (JJ Teochew))
                            (NNS dishes)))
                        (CC and)
                        (VP (VB decide)
                          (SBAR (IN if)
                            (S
                              (NP (PRP you))
                              (VP (MD would)
                                (VP (VB like)
                                  (S
                                    (VP (TO to)
                                      (VP
                                        (VP (VB burn)
                                          (NP
                                            (NP (DT a) (NN hole))
                                            (PP (IN in)
                                              (NP (PRP$ your) (NN pocket)))))
                                        (CC or)
                                        (VP (VB keep)
                                          (S
                                            (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS pants))
                                            (ADJP (JJ intact))))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(place-5, is-2)

aux(enjoy-12, to-11)
infmod(family-10, enjoy-12)
det(dishes-17, a-13)
amod(dishes-17, few-14)
advmod(Teochew-16, typically-15)
amod(dishes-17, Teochew-16)

conj(enjoy-12, decide-19)

aux(like-23, would-22)
advcl(decide-19, like-23)

xcomp(like-23, burn-25)

(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NN dinner)
      (CC and)
      (NN supper))
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Recommended))
      (PP (IN by)
